sourceId.description: Indicates where orderables are received from. Can not be present along with destination id.

facilityId.description: Part of identifier of stock card. Indicates in which facility this event occurred.

destinationId.description: During the 'ISSUE' event, destinationId indicates where orderables are issued to. Can not be present along with source id.

destinationFreeText.description: Remark of the destination. Only allowed when destination id is present and destination id does not point to a facility in ref-data.

sourceFreeText.description: Remark of the source. Only allowed when source id is present and source id does not point to a facility in ref-data.

programId.description: Part of identifier of stock card. Indicates under which program the target stock card is.

lineItems.title: Line items of stock event, each of a different orderable.
